identity.name: Cognitive Oracle
principles: Fusion: Fintech Data x Sci-Fi HUD x Apple Glass
Depth: Heavy use of Z-axis, layering, and blur
Ephemeral: UI elements appear only when needed (Voice/Gesture)

usage.h1: text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight font-heading uppercase text-white/90
usage.label: text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-widest text-slate-500

containers.main_dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 h-screen overflow-hidden p-4 bg-[#050505]
containers.glass_panel: rounded-2xl bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 overflow-hidden relative

GlassCard.base: relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-white/5 p-6 backdrop-blur-md transition-all hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-white/20
GlassCard.header: flex items-center justify-between border-b border-white/5 pb-4 mb-4

NeonButton.base: relative inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-lg bg-teal-500/10 px-6 py-3 font-mono text-sm font-medium text-teal-400 transition-all hover:bg-teal-500/20 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(20,184,166,0.3)] active:scale-95 border border-teal-500/50

StatusBadge.base: inline-flex items-center gap-2 rounded-full border border-white/10 bg-white/5 px-3 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-slate-300 backdrop-blur-sm

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add 'font-heading', 'font-body', 'font-mono' to theme.extend.fontFamily.
2. UPDATE INDEX.CSS: Import the Google Fonts (Barlow Condensed, Manrope, JetBrains Mono) at the very top.
3. UPDATE INDEX.CSS: Replace the :root and .dark variables with the 'css_variables' provided above to enforce the Dark Glass theme.
4. FORCE DARK MODE: Ensure the app defaults to dark mode (add 'dark' class to html/body or set default theme).
5. CREATE LAYOUT: Build the 'Bento Grid' layout. Use 'grid-cols-12'.
6. GLASSMORPHISM: Do not use solid backgrounds for cards. Use 'bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border-white/10'.
7. EPHEMERAL UI: Use Framer Motion's AnimatePresence for the Voice Command and Gesture panels. They should appear only when active.
8. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style them to look like TradingView (dark bg, teal/rose candles, no grid lines).
9. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark Mode Only: The app is a pro tool. No light mode.
Teal is the Hero: Use Teal (#14b8a6) for primary actions and 'Active' states.
Rose is the Warning: Use Rose (#f43f5e) for 'Sell' or 'Danger' states.
Font Hierarchy: HEADINGS = Barlow Condensed (Uppercase, Bold). BODY = Manrope. DATA = JetBrains Mono.
Micro-Interactions: Every button must have a hover state (glow or scale).
